text: John J. Sinsimer (March 19, 1923 – September 26, 1997) was an American politician who served in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1972 to 1976. He died on September 26, 1997, in Pompton Lakes, New Jersey at age 74. He is the only Democrat to have represented the 24th District. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Members of the New Jersey General Assembly Category:New Jersey Democrats Category:20th-century American politicians
title: John J. Sinsimer
